description: Requests that may benefit from delegation, phrased non-technically.

experiments.title: Summarize common failures
experiments.prompt: Please use the repository at https://github.com/helm/helm. Scan for repeated TODO or FIXME patterns and summarize them briefly.

experiments.title: Create a runbook
experiments.prompt: Please use the repository at https://github.com/helm/helm. Write a concise runbook for building and running this project so a new teammate can follow it.
